<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Silvanshee (Cat Agathion)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1055)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Silvanshees are a stealthy and extremely inquisitive contingent of agathions who gather information about the mortal world for other agathions. While they love to explore the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1) and sate their curiosity, they're generally reclusive and skittish. These dual instincts war with each other whenever something exciting piques their interest. Because of their small sizes, they don't pose a combat threat to most creatures; instead, silvanshees act as [Nirvana's](/Planes.aspx?ID=20) eyes and ears in the mortal world, reporting back to superiors or calling for help should they run into danger.

 Silvanshees appear indistinguishable from domestic felines, save for their violet eyes and the telltale blaze of differently colored fur on their chests. Of course, flying gives them away outright, so if at all possible, they only do so while in trusted company to avoid detection.

 Their fur color runs the spectrum of normal feline colorations. They can also transform into mist when necessary to maintain discretion or make a hasty getaway.

([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 15

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<image src="/images/Monsters/Agathion_Silvanshee.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Silvanshee](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1055)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Agathion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=349" />
<trait label="Celestial" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=23" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 10</row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +3, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +6, [Nirvana Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +3, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Cat's Curiosity** A silvanshee's core value is curiosity. This enables them to seek out new experiences and information beyond their current understanding. A silvanshee can use trained skill actions for all skills, even if they're untrained.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 20

**Weaknesses**
evil 3

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +9 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 1d6–2 piercing plus 1d4 good

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 1d4–2 slashing plus 1d4 good

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 16
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Know Direction](/Spells.aspx?ID=169), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **4th**
[Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129) (×3), [Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247)
- **Constant (2nd)**
[Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=293)

**Champion Focus Spell** DC 16, 1 Focus Point
- **1st**
[Lay on Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=395)

**Cat's Grace**   When a silvanshee uses their [_gaseous form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=129) spell, the mist form remains roughly the size and shape of a cat, and the silvanshee retains their fly speed in this form.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Silvanshee Allies</title>

Silvanshees will work with heroes who remain patient with their curiosity and skittishness. They're inquisitive, alternating between affection and aloofness. They do what they can to aid and defend their companions, but their strong sense of self-preservation means they'll likely flee if they sense they can't win a fight.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-216" />
